channel.title: Making myself a owner
channel.description: i dont know how to make myself a owner in testscape i'v tried changing my player rights in the characters folder from 0 to 3 but it still won't work.

easy very easy m8

item.title: Making myself a owner
item.dc:creator: @sokol sokol
item.description:
@sokol wrote:

yeh just go to client.java and search for player rights or if you have TestScape then search for Admin or Owner then when it will fund it cheange it to your name where its say owner or player right 3… its easy … dont forget to compile after that.

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself a owner
item.dc:creator: @system system
item.description:
@system wrote:

He was saying that didnt work. Your source engine doesnt run that way. You must go into the client itself and make your charachter an admin. There are at least a dozen tuts on this, please check it out the tutorials section found here: http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php?board=51.0

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself a owner
item.dc:creator: @Mopar_Helper Mopar Helper
item.description:
@Mopar_Helper wrote:

Guys, do better than this, making yourself look like nooby coders!

Here

Open your source folder and go on characters, find your name and click on it, it should have:

[code] CHANGE THE PLAYER RIGHTS TO 3!
[ACCOUNT]
character-username = Owner
character-password = 156-223-180-57-199-135-110-112-62-48-120-100-201-22-122-21

[CHARACTER]
character-height = 0
character-posx = 3252
character-posy = 3421
character-rights = 3
character-ismember = 1
character-messages = 0
character-lastconnection = USER-B73355E866
character-lastlogin = 20070018
character-energy = 100
character-gametime = 0
character-gamecount = 24134[/code]
Change this :

 character-rights = 3

Hope i helped.

Read full topic

item.title: Making myself a owner
item.dc:creator: @nightwolf nightwolf
item.description:
@nightwolf wrote:

Open your char file and edit player rights to 3 and you’ll be owner.
